item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
STELLA BLUES

Specials include $1 off all draft beer and glasses of a selected house wine.

We will be collecting goods for the Connecticut Food Bank at this happy hour, so any contributions of canned goods, dry goods (rice, pasta, etc.), and personal care items (shampoo, toothpaste, toothbrushes, diapers, deodorant, etc.) would be very much welcomed and appreciated.

Your contact for this event is Ben: 203-554-5144

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour & CT Food Bank donations drive - Stella Blues Bar
